column1: What a beautiful starlit sky.
It's several times more beautiful than the usual night sky!
Even though I also use star-shaped danmaku,
it's nothing next to real stars!
Thank you for the compliment.
Everything you see right now
is my power.
That said, are you the Star God?
Indeed.
Welcome to my starlit world.
My name is Tensei Muriya.
So, these meteorites are your doing, too?
I am only here to respond to the sincerest prayers.
You know, I actually thought you were the one who summoned me.
What makes you think so?
Because your magic is very powerful,
but since you already possess great strength, why do you seek me? Did something happen?
I'm not really that strong, actually.
I often lose to that red-white shrine maiden, after all!
But since you are able to grant any wishes,
then I'll make one.
Please give me the most powerful magic!
No matter how many years pass,
humans still are greedy, as always.
It can't be helped, I guess.
After all, everyone would like to have the most powerful magic easily right?
Do you really think it will be so easy?
What?
For every fallen star, you must respond to it by having your soul serve as an exchange.
This way, the cosmic law of energy will be balanced.
If that so-called wish is to come true, the price must be paid in the form of that soul.
as this can only be achieved by breaking the laws of nature.
Now I need to exchange my life!?
You said you wanted the most powerful magic,
so as payment for it,
I'll receive your soul!
I won't let you!
